data.oai_dc:dc: Insect taxa captured by modified window traps

Number of specimens per insect taxon captured by top and bottom collection units of modified window traps in forests in the southern Black Forest (Germany) between March and August in 2017. Column names: PlotID - Identifier for study plot, TrapID - Identifier for each of two traps per study plot, Collection_Unit - Identifier for top or bottom collection unit of a trap, Collect_start/_end - Start/end of a sampling period, Sampling_period - Identifier for pooling samples despite varying collection start into sampling periods, Sample_ID - Unique identifier for each sample
Arthropod diversity|biodiversity inventory|flight interception trap|insect sampling|monitoring|temperate forest|window trap
